name: azmcp_appconfig_account_list
description: Retrieve all App Configuration stores in a subscription, returned as a list of dictionaries containing their name, ID, and location.

subscription.description: The Azure subscription ID or name, which can be a GUID identifier or display name.

auth_method.description: Authentication method to use: 'credential' (Azure CLI/managed identity), 'key' (access key), or 'connectionString'. Defaults to None.

tenant.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID or name, specified as a GUID identifier or display name. Defaults to None.

retry_max_retries.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed operations; defaults to `None`.

retry_delay.description: Initial delay in seconds between retry attempts; serves as the base for exponential backoff. Defaults to None.

retry_max_delay.description: Maximum retry delay in seconds, independent of the retry strategy. Defaults to None.

retry_mode.description: The retry strategy to use: `'fixed'` for consistent delays or `'exponential'` for increasing delays. Defaults to `None`.

retry_network_timeout.description: The network operation timeout in seconds; operations exceeding this duration will be cancelled. Defaults to None.

name: azmcp_appconfig_kv_delete
description: Removes a key-value pair from an App Configuration store, deleting the labeled version if specified, or the default-labeled version otherwise.

subscription.description: The Azure subscription ID or name, which can be its GUID identifier or display name.

account_name.description: Name of the App Configuration store (e.g., `my-appconfig`).

key.description: The name of the App Configuration store key to access.

auth_method.description: Specifies the authentication method to use: `credential` (Azure CLI/managed identity), `key` (access key), or `connectionString`.

label.description: The label applied to the configuration key for grouping and organizing settings.

retry_delay.description: Specifies the initial delay in seconds between retry attempts, used as the base for exponential backoff.

retry_max_delay.description: Maximum delay in seconds between retries, regardless of the retry strategy.

retry_max_retries.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed operations.

retry_mode.description: A retry strategy to use; 'fixed' employs consistent delays, while 'exponential' increases delay between attempts.

retry_network_timeout.description: Network operation timeout in seconds; operations exceeding this duration are cancelled.

tenant.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID or name, which can be either its GUID identifier or display name.

name: azmcp_appconfig_kv_list
description: List all key-value pairs from an App Configuration store, displaying their key, value, label, content type, ETag, last modified time, and lock status.

subscription.description: The Azure subscription ID or name, specified as a GUID or display name.

account_name.description: The name of the App Configuration store (e.g., `my-appconfig`).

auth_method.description: The authentication method to use: 'credential' (Azure CLI/managed identity), 'key' (access key), or 'connectionString'.

key.description: An optional string filter for retrieving key-values, supporting exact matches (e.g., 'foo') or wildcard searches with a trailing '*' (e.g., 'App*'); if omitted, all keys are retrieved.

label.description: A case-sensitive label filter for retrieving key-values, supporting exact matches or wildcards (`*` at the end); retrieves all labels if omitted.

retry_delay.description: A string representing the initial delay in positive seconds between retry attempts, used as the base for exponential backoff.

retry_max_delay.description: Maximum positive seconds to delay between retries, applied regardless of the retry strategy.

retry_max_retries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts (non-negative integer) for failed operations.

retry_mode.description: The retry strategy to use: 'fixed' for consistent delays, or 'exponential' for increasing delays between attempts.

retry_network_timeout.description: Network operation timeout in seconds; operations exceeding this duration are cancelled.

tenant.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID or name, which can be its GUID identifier or display name.

name: azmcp_appconfig_kv_lock
description: Lock an App Configuration key-value to read-only mode, preventing modifications, by providing the account name, key, and an optional label for a specific version.

subscription.description: The Azure subscription's ID (GUID) or display name.

account_name.description: The name of the App Configuration store, such as `my-appconfig`.

key.description: The name of the key to access in the App Configuration store.

auth_method.description: Authentication method to use; options are 'credential' (Azure CLI/managed identity), 'key' (access key), or 'connectionString'; defaults to None.

tenant.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID or name, which can be a GUID identifier or display name; defaults to `None`.

retry_max_retries.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed operations; defaults to `None`.

retry_delay.description: Initial delay in seconds between retry attempts, used as the base for exponential backoff. Defaults to None.

retry_max_delay.description: Maximum delay in seconds between retries, regardless of the retry strategy. Defaults to None.

retry_mode.description: A retry strategy that is 'fixed' for consistent delays or 'exponential' for increasing delays between attempts. Defaults to None.

retry_network_timeout.description: Network operation timeout in seconds; operations exceeding this duration will be cancelled. Defaults to None.

label.description: The label to apply to the configuration key, used for grouping and organizing settings. Defaults to None.

name: azmcp_appconfig_kv_set
description: Creates or updates a key-value setting in an App Configuration store using the specified account name, key, value, and an optional label that defaults if not provided.

subscription.description: The Azure subscription ID or name, which can be its GUID identifier or display name.

account_name.description: The name of the App Configuration store, for example `my-appconfig`.

key.description: The name of the key within the App Configuration store.

value.description: The value to set for the configuration key.

auth_method.description: Specifies the authentication method to use: `credential` (Azure CLI/managed identity), `key` (access key), or `connectionString`.

label.description: The label to apply to the configuration key, used to group and organize settings.

retry_delay.description: The initial delay in seconds between retry attempts, serving as the base for exponential backoff.

retry_max_delay.description: Maximum delay in seconds between retries, regardless of the retry strategy.

retry_max_retries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations.

retry_mode.description: The retry strategy to use: 'fixed' for consistent delays, or 'exponential' for increasing delays between attempts.

retry_network_timeout.description: The network operation timeout in seconds; operations exceeding this duration are cancelled.

tenant.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID or name, which can be a GUID identifier or the tenant's display name.

name: azmcp_appconfig_kv_show
description: Retrieve and display a specific key-value setting from an App Configuration store, including its value, label, content type, ETag, last modified time, and lock status, by specifying an account name and key, with an optional label defaulting to the null label if not provided.

subscription.description: The Azure subscription ID or name, which can be a GUID identifier or its display name.

account_name.description: The name of the App Configuration store (e.g., `my-appconfig`).

key.description: The name of the key within the App Configuration store.

auth_method.description: Authentication method to use, supporting 'credential' (Azure CLI/managed identity), 'key' (access key), or 'connectionString'. Defaults to None.

label.description: A label to apply to the configuration key, used to group and organize settings; defaults to `None` for the default label.

retry_delay.description: The initial delay in seconds between retry attempts, used as the base for exponential backoff. Defaults to None.

retry_max_delay.description: The maximum delay in seconds between retries, enforced regardless of the retry strategy. Defaults to None.

retry_max_retries.description: The maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations; defaults to None.

retry_mode.description: The retry strategy: `fixed` for consistent delays or `exponential` for increasing delays. Defaults to None.

retry_network_timeout.description: Network operation timeout in seconds; operations exceeding this duration will be cancelled. Defaults to None.

tenant.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID or name, which can be a GUID identifier or display name, defaults to None.

name: azmcp_appconfig_kv_unlock
description: Unlocks a key-value setting in an App Configuration store by removing its read-only mode, allowing modifications; requires an account name and key, and optionally a label to target a specific or default version.

account_name.description: The name of the App Configuration store (e.g., `my-appconfig`).

key.description: The App Configuration store key name.

subscription.description: The GUID identifier or display name for the Azure subscription to use.

auth_method.description: Specifies the authentication method to use: `credential` (Azure CLI/managed identity), `key` (access key), or `connectionString`.

label.description: A label to apply to the configuration key, used for grouping and organizing settings.

retry_delay.description: Initial delay in seconds between retry attempts, used as the base for exponential backoff.

retry_max_delay.description: Maximum retry delay in seconds, independent of the retry strategy.

retry_max_retries.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed operations.

retry_mode.description: A retry strategy to use, either 'fixed' for consistent delays or 'exponential' for increasing delays between attempts.

retry_network_timeout.description: The network operation timeout in seconds; operations exceeding this duration are cancelled.

tenant.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID or name, specified as its GUID identifier or display name.

retry_delay.description: Initial delay in seconds between retry attempts, used as the base for exponential backoff. Defaults to None (not implemented).

retry_network_timeout.description: A string representing a non-negative integer for the network operation timeout in seconds, which cancels operations that exceed this duration.
